text: Raffaele Buzzi (born 17 July 1995) is an Italian Nordic combined skier who competes internationally.FIS profile He competed at the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Italy Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:People from Tolmezzo Category:Competitors at the 2012 Winter Youth Olympics
title: Raffaele Buzzi
